name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-LG-948101
categories: Toys & Games > Building & Construction > LEGO Sets
title: LEGO City Space Explorer Rover & Alien Life
description: Ignite young imaginations with the LEGO City Space Explorer Rover & Alien Life building set. This 311-piece set features a detailed space rover with 6 large tires and advanced suspension for traversing rocky alien terrain. Includes 2 astronaut minifigures, a robot figure, and two alien figures for endless outer space adventures. The rover has a detailed lab, crane arm, and a storage bay for collected samples.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-DL-237455
categories: Toys & Games > Dolls & Dollhouses > Fashion Dolls
title: Starlight Dreamers Galaxy Glimmer Fashion Doll
description: Meet Luna, the Galaxy Glimmer doll from the Starlight Dreamers collection! Dressed in a shimmering iridescent gown with star-shaped accessories, Luna is ready for any cosmic ball. Her long, flowing hair has streaks of purple and blue, perfect for styling. The doll is fully articulated for endless posing possibilities and comes with a doll stand and a collectible poster.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-AF-650219
categories: Toys & Games > Action Figures & Playsets > Superhero Action Figures
title: Marvel Legends Series Spider-Man 6-Inch Collectible Action Figure
description: With over 80 years of comic book history, Marvel has become a cornerstone of fan collections. The Marvel Legends Series features fan favorite Marvel Comic Universe and Marvel Cinematic Universe characters with premium design and articulation for poseability and display in collections. This 6-inch scale Spider-Man figure features multiple points of articulation and includes 3 pairs of interchangeable hands and a web accessory.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-BG-118834
categories: Toys & Games > Games & Puzzles > Family Board Games
title: Jungle Quest Adventure Board Game
description: Embark on an epic adventure in Jungle Quest! Players work together as a team of explorers to find a lost temple and its hidden treasure. Navigate treacherous paths, avoid traps, and use your unique character abilities to succeed. This cooperative game is perfect for family game night. Features a modular game board for high replayability.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-RC-550321
categories: Toys & Games > Vehicles, Trains & RC > Remote Control Cars & Drones
title: Nitro-X Terrain Dominator RC Monster Truck
description: Unleash the power of the Terrain Dominator! This 1:10 scale RC monster truck is built for extreme off-road action. With its high-torque motor, 4-wheel drive, and oil-filled shocks, no obstacle is too great. The 2.4GHz remote provides precise control with a range of up to 250 feet. Includes a rechargeable 7.4V Li-Po battery and charger for long-lasting fun.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-PL-700941
categories: Toys & Games > Plush & Stuffed Animals > Interactive Stuffed Animals
title: FurReal CuddlePup Interactive Puppy Toy
description: Welcome home a new best friend with the FurReal CuddlePup! This adorable interactive puppy responds to touch with realistic sounds and motions. Pet its head and it will bark happily, wag its tail, and nuzzle into you. With super soft fur and expressive eyes, CuddlePup is the perfect companion for imaginative play. Requires 3 AA batteries (included).

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-STEM-44101
categories: Learning & STEM > STEM Toys > Science Kits & Experiments
title: National Geographic Ultimate Volcano Kit
description: Create an incredible eruption with the National Geographic Ultimate Volcano Kit! This STEM kit has everything you need to build a volcano, paint it, and make it erupt. The improved mold and plaster make for a sturdy, reusable volcano. Includes eruption powder, paints, and a detailed learning guide full of fun facts about volcanoes. A hands-on science project for the whole family.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-RO-887654
categories: Outdoor & Ride-On Toys > Ride-On Toys > Battery-Powered Ride-Ons
title: Power Wheels Adventure Seeker 12V Ride-On SUV
description: The backyard becomes a grand adventure with the Power Wheels Adventure Seeker Ride-On! This battery-powered SUV features rugged tires for multi-terrain driving, a real working radio, and a spacious rear storage area. It drives at two speeds forward (2.5 and 5 mph) plus reverse, with a high-speed lockout for beginners and Power-Lock brakes for safety. Seats two riders.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-AC-901247
categories: Arts & Crafts > Craft Kits > Slime & Putty Kits
title: Crayola Galaxy Slime Activity Kit
description: Create out-of-this-world gooey fun with the Crayola Galaxy Slime Activity Kit! This all-in-one kit includes everything you need to make your own shimmering, cosmic slime. Mix in glitter, beads, and star confetti to create a unique galaxy effect. The non-toxic formula is safe and easy to clean up. Kit makes three separate batches of slime.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-BD-335108
categories: Toys & Games > Dolls & Dollhouses > Baby Dolls & Accessories
title: Melissa & Doug Mine to Love 'My First Baby' Doll
description: Perfect for little nurturers, the 'My First Baby' doll from the Mine to Love collection is an adorable 12-inch doll with a soft, huggable body and molded plastic head. She can suck her thumb or the included pacifier, and her eyes open and close. Dressed in a sweet, removable sleeper and cap, this baby doll is the perfect size for toddlers to cuddle and care for.

name: projects/toysrus-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_75355_LEGO_XWING
categories: Toys & Games > Building & Construction > LEGO Sets
Toys & Games > Building & Construction > Model Kits (Cars, Planes, etc.)
title: LEGO Star Wars X-Wing Starfighter Building Set 75355
description: Build an incredibly detailed Ultimate Collector Series version of the X-Wing Starfighter from the classic Star Wars trilogy. This set includes a Luke Skywalker LEGO minifigure with a lightsaber and an R2-D2 LEGO droid figure. The X-wing features an opening cockpit, space behind the cockpit for R2-D2, wings that can be adjusted from flight to attack mode at the turn of a switch, and a buildable display stand.

name: projects/toysrus-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_HCD46_BARBIE_CAMPER
categories: Toys & Games > Dolls & Dollhouses > Playset Vehicles & Accessories
Toys & Games > Dolls & Dollhouses > Dollhouses & Furniture
title: Barbie DreamCamper 3-in-1 Playset with Pool & Truck
description: This Barbie DreamCamper transforms from a comfortable RV into a spectacular campsite playground with a pool! With the press of a button, the top pops up, the side pops out and the back expands to create a play space more than 2 feet long. Features a pool, water slide, fire pit, and a full kitchen setup. Dolls sold separately.

name: projects/toysrus-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_GNL70_HW_GARAGE
categories: Toys & Games > Vehicles, Trains & RC > Race Tracks & Playsets
Toys & Games > Vehicles, Trains & RC > Playset Vehicles & Accessories
title: Hot Wheels Ultimate Garage Playset with T-Rex Attack
description: The Hot Wheels City Ultimate Garage is the TALLEST garage yet, offering endless storytelling and vehicle action play! This enormous playset has parking for up to 100+ vehicles and a surprising Robo T-Rex nemesis that fuels kids' imagination. Take vehicles all the way up in the kid-powered two-car elevator, then race down through the multi-level garage and experiment with multi-play mode for continuous thrills!

name: projects/toysrus-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_RV17937_COSMIC_PUZZLE
categories: Toys & Games > Games & Puzzles > Jigsaw Puzzles (By Piece Count)
title: Ravensburger "Cosmic Wonders" 1000 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle for Adults
description: Escape to a galaxy of shimmering nebulae and distant stars with the 'Cosmic Wonders' 1000-piece puzzle. Ravensburger puzzles are crafted with premium quality, in terms of both content and material. Our Softclick Technology guarantees a perfect interlocking fit for a satisfying puzzle experience.

name: projects/toysrus-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_E7752_PLAYDOH_NOODLE
categories: Arts & Crafts > Modeling & Sculpting > Modeling Clay & Dough
Arts & Crafts > Craft Kits > Sand Art & Painting Kits
title: Play-Doh Kitchen Creations Noodle Makin' Mania Set
description: This noodle-making machine is ready to crank out the fun! Load some Play-Doh compound to crank out piles of pretend pasta and more. There are also molds for creating make-believe macaroni and pretend ravioli. The set includes the noodle maker, 4 noodle discs, ravioli book-mold, lasagne cutter, bowl, plate, fork, and 5 cans of Play-Doh Brand Modeling Compound.

name: projects/toysrus-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_80602140_LEAPTOP_TOUCH
categories: Learning & STEM > Educational Toys > Learning Laptops & Tablets
Learning & STEM > Early Development Toys > Infant Sensory Toys
title: LeapFrog 2-in-1 LeapTop Touch
description: Twist and learn with the 2-in-1 LeapTop Touch! Kids can learn about letters, numbers, music and more on a pretend laptop made just for them. Open the laptop to see the screen in keyboard mode, then close the laptop and magically watch the screen swivel into a touch tablet. The laptop features a full A-Z keyboard and number keys 1-10, while the tablet features a touch screen.

name: projects/toysrus-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_F0327_MARVEL_CAPTAIN
categories: Toys & Games > Action Figures & Playsets > Superhero Action Figures
Toys & Games > Action Figures & Playsets > Collectible Figures
title: Marvel Legends Series Captain America (Sam Wilson) 6-inch Action Figure
description: With over 80 years of entertainment history, Marvel has become a cornerstone of fan collections around the world. With the Marvel Legends Series, fan favorite Marvel Comic Universe and Marvel Cinematic Universe characters are designed with premium detail and articulation for posing and display in collections. This quality 6-inch Legends Series Sam Wilson Captain America figure features multiple points of articulation and is a great addition to any action figure collection.

name: projects/toysrus-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_RF32_STEEL_WAGON
categories: Outdoor & Ride-On Toys > Ride-On Toys > Wagons
title: Radio Flyer All-Terrain Steel & Wood Wagon
description: The classic red wagon just got a major upgrade! The Radio Flyer All-Terrain Steel & Wood Wagon is built for adventure. The high wooden sides are removable for easy loading and unloading, and the rugged, 10-inch air tires provide a smooth ride on any terrain. Its extra-long handle folds under for easy storage.

name: projects/toysrus-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_FP6871_STACKER_BUNDLE
categories: Learning & STEM > Early Development Toys > Shape Sorters & Stacking Toys
title: Fisher-Price Rock-a-Stack and Baby's First Blocks Bundle
description: Two classic baby toys in one great bundle! The Rock-a-Stack toy features a tower of five colorful rings to grasp, shake, and stack. Baby’s First Blocks offers classic sorting and put-and-take fun with 10 colorful blocks and a take-along storage bucket. These toys help develop hand-eye coordination and problem-solving skills.

name: projects/toysrus-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_TRX58034_STAMPEDE_4X4
categories: Toys & Games > Vehicles, Trains & RC > Remote Control Cars & Drones
title: Traxxas Stampede 4X4 VXL Brushless RTR Monster Truck
description: Unleash the power of the Traxxas Stampede 4X4 VXL! This ready-to-race monster truck features a Velineon brushless power system for blistering speed, and its waterproof electronics mean the fun doesn't stop for rain or puddles. With its high-riding monster truck chassis and ultra-tough 4WD drivetrain, Stampede is built for all-terrain action. Battery and charger sold separately.
